body.p: Which one of the following types of code runs on the CPU directly?

response.feedback: C++ is a high-level language. It works via translation instead of running on the CPU directly.
JavaScript is a high-level language. It works via translation instead of running on the CPU directly.
Machine code is the native language of the CPU.
Python is a high-level language. It works via translation instead of running on the CPU directly.
C is a high-level language. It works via translation instead of running on the CPU directly.
